trans-unit.source: Where RITA is enabled, tax country is the tax reporting country.

seg-source.mrk: Where RITA is enabled, tax country is the tax reporting country.

target.mrk: RITA が有効化されている場合、課税国は税申告国です。

trans-unit.source: Registration for Indirect Taxation Abroad (RITA) enables indirect tax calculation for multiple countries within a single legal entity. The <uicontrol>tax country</uicontrol> field allows you to maintain a tax country that is different from the company code country. Rather than calculating and reporting indirect taxation at the company code level, RITA uses the tax country plus the tax code to determine the tax rates and relevant G/L account determination for tax-relevant transactions.

seg-source.mrk: Registration for Indirect Taxation Abroad (RITA) enables indirect tax calculation for multiple countries within a single legal entity.
The <uicontrol>tax country</uicontrol> field allows you to maintain a tax country that is different from the company code country.

Rather than calculating and reporting indirect taxation at the company code level, RITA uses the tax country plus the tax code to determine the tax rates and relevant G/L account determination for tax-relevant transactions.

target.mrk: 国外の間接課税登録 (RITA) を使用すると、単一法人組織内の複数の国の間接税計算を実行することができます。
<uicontrol>課税国</uicontrol>項目を使用すると、会社コードの国とは異なる課税国に更新することができます。
RITA では会社コードレベルで間接課税を計算およびレポートするのではなく、課税国と税コードを使用して、税関連の取引に対する税率および関連する G/L 勘定設定を決定します。

trans-unit.source: Tax country is always used in combination with a tax code. If no tax reporting country is entered in the document, the system uses the company code country by default.

seg-source.mrk: Tax country is always used in combination with a tax code.
If no tax reporting country is entered in the document, the system uses the company code country by default.

target.mrk: 課税国は、常に税コードとの組合せで使用されます。
伝票に税申告国が入力されていない場合は、デフォルトで会社コードの国が使用されます。

trans-unit.source: Normally, documents contain only one tax reporting country, but there are numerous business cases with multiple tax countries in a single document. An example would be an incoming supplier invoice with two tax countries, one for goods, the other for services. Another example can be sales of goods with different tax departure countries, or sales of services to customers in countries where the services are taxed by the receiving country. In these kinds of cases, the <uicontrol>tax country</uicontrol> is maintained at the line-item level, which simplifies payments and reporting of indirect taxes.

seg-source.mrk: Normally, documents contain only one tax reporting country, but there are numerous business cases with multiple tax countries in a single document.
An example would be an incoming supplier invoice with two tax countries, one for goods, the other for services.
Another example can be sales of goods with different tax departure countries, or sales of services to customers in countries where the services are taxed by the receiving country.
In these kinds of cases, the <uicontrol>tax country</uicontrol> is maintained at the line-item level, which simplifies payments and reporting of indirect taxes.

target.mrk: 通常、伝票には 1 つの税申告国しか含まれませんが、1 つの伝票に複数の課税国が含まれるビジネスケースは多数存在します。
例として、2 つの課税国 (一方は商品に、もう一方はサービスに課税) が含まれるサプライヤ請求書があります。
別の例として、出荷国が異なる商品の売上、または受取国によってサービスが課税される国の得意先に対するサービスの売上があります。
このような場合、<uicontrol>課税国</uicontrol>は明細レベルで更新されるため、支払と間接税のレポートが簡略化されます。
